data.name: Help_Topic_Careers_Question_HowTo
data.value: How can I drive a Yoyoloop vehicle?

data.name: Help_Topic_Careers_Question_HowTo_Answer
data.value: Our team is growing! If you want to join our team, please send your CV to careers@yoyoloop.com.

data.name: Help_Topic_Corporate_Question_CorporatePricing
data.value: Do you have special prices for companies?

data.name: Help_Topic_Corporate_Question_CorporatePricing_Answer
data.value: Yes. We offer special prices and discounts for companies, as well as service launch programmes for company employees. For more information, please send an email to empresas@yoyoloop.com.

data.name: Help_Topic_Corporate_Question_TaxInvoices_Answer
data.value: Yes. As soon as you select your trip, you only need to select the "Company" box and insert the VAT number on the Billing Details section.

data.name: Help_Topic_Corporate_Question_TotalSpending
data.value: Can I know how much I spent in total?

data.name: Help_Topic_Corporate_Question_TotalSpending_Answer
data.value: Yoyoloop sends its corporate clients a monthly email with a summary of all of the trips and the total spend.

data.name: Help_Topic_DiscountAndPromo_Question_PromoAndMGM
data.value: How can I book €1 trips and how can I apply a promo code?

data.name: Help_Topic_DiscountAndPromo_Question_PromoAndMGM_Answer
data.value: To book the €1 trips you won for inviting your friends, you only need to access your account and click on "Invite friends". This is where you can see all the €1 trips you still have available. You only need to click on "Book" to book a €1 for any destination. To use a friend's promo code, you simply need to click on "I have a promo code" on the box on the right side of your screen when you're selecting your trip. Paste your code, click on "Book" and you're done!

data.name: Help_Topic_DiscountAndPromo_Question_TwoPromocodes
data.value: Can I use two promo codes for the same trip?

data.name: Help_Topic_DiscountAndPromo_Question_TwoPromocodes_Answer
data.value: No. Each promo code can only be used for one trip.

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_FriendsBenefits
data.value: What do my friends earn for booking with my promode?

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_FriendsBenefits_Answer
data.value: Every time you share your promo code with your friends, you receive a €1 trip for any Yoyoloop destination, as will your friends.

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_GiftToYoyoUsers
data.value: Can I share my promo codes with friends who have already used Yoyoloop?

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_GiftToYoyoUsers_Answer
data.value: No. Promo codes can only be applied on a new user's first trip with Yoyoloop.

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_HowManyFriends
data.value: How many friends can I invite?

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_HowManyFriends_Answer
data.value: You can invite as many as you like! The more friends you invite, the more €1 trips you win as soon as they travel for the first time.

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_MyBenefits_Answer
data.value: For each friend who travels with Yoyoloop for the first time with your promo code, you can travel to any destination for just €1!

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_Share
data.value: Where can I share my promo code?

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_Share_Answer
data.value: You can share your promo code on Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, LinkedIn or by email. You can also easily copy your code and share it with your friends in any way you like.

data.name: Help_Topic_Luggage_Question_CanIBring
data.value: Can I bring luggage with me?

data.name: Help_Topic_Luggage_Question_CanIBring_Answer
data.value: Yes, as long as they are within Yoyoloop's baggage limits.

data.name: Help_Topic_Luggage_Question_NotAllowed
data.value: What can't I bring with me?

data.name: Help_Topic_Luggage_Question_NotAllowed_Answer
data.value: Yoyoloop vehicles cannot carry sharp tools, weapons, pets, inflamable materials, or materials with strong scents. If you don't know whether or not you'll be able to take a certain object with you, please send an email to reservas@yoyoloop.com.

data.name: Help_Topic_Luggage_Question_SizeLimit_Answer
data.value: You can transport hand luggage (56cm x 45cm x 25cm) similar to the carry-on bags that are allowed in airplanes.

data.name: Help_Topic_Partners_Question_HowTo
data.value: How can I become a Yoyoloop partner?

data.name: Help_Topic_Partners_Question_HowTo_Answer
data.value: To become a Yoyoloop partner, please send an email to our partnerships team: parceiros@yoyoloop.com.

data.name: Help_Topic_Partners_Question_PartnerProgram_Answer
data.value: Our partner programme is in development. If your company operates in the tourism industry and has its own fleet, we want to talk to you. Please send an email to parceiros@yoyoloop.com.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_AssignedSeats_Answer
data.value: Your seat is guaranteed, but at the moment it's not possible to book a specific seat in one of our vehicles.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_AvailableLoops_Answer
data.value: Yoyoloop has loops from Lisbon to Porto, Coimbra and Leiria, and from Porto to Coimbra, Leiria and Lisbon.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_BuyAtDeparture
data.value: Can I book a trip at the departure spot?

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_BuyAtDeparture_Answer
data.value: You can book a trip wherever you are in the mobile version of our website. If there are free spots, you only need to book your trip and show your ticket as soon as your driver arrives.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_Cancel_Answer
data.value: You can cancel a trip up to 48 hours before the departure time. The amount you paid will be transformed into credit. You'll be able to find it on your account to use in future trips.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_ChangeDate
data.value: How can I change the date of my trip?

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_ChangeDate_Answer
data.value: You can change the day and time of your trip up to 48 hours before the departure time. You can make this change by phone — +351 926 475 250 — or by email — reservas@yoyoloop.com.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_CouldNotBook
data.value: I wasn't able to book a trip online. Now what?

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_CouldNotBook_Answer
data.value: You can book a trip by email — reservas@yoyoloop.com — or by calling +351 926 475 250. Alternatively, you can simply show up at the loop's departure spot and purchase your ticket from the Yoyoloop driver.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_DifferentAP
data.value: Can I ask you to pick me up in a different location?

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_DifferentAP_Answer
data.value: Yoyoloop is a service with predefined departure and arrival spots, so it is not possible to pick up passengers in different locations. However, we are always available to create new departure and/or arrival spots in the future. If you have any suggestions, send us an email to reservas@yoyoloop.com.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_DownloadTicket
data.value: How do I download my ticket?

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_DownloadTicket_Answer
data.value: You can receive your ticket by email, SMS or you can download it as a PDF. After purchasing your ticket, select your favourite option and present your ticket when your driver arrives. Avoid printing your ticket; show it on your smartphone instead!

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_FindAP
data.value: Where can I find the departure and arrival spot of my trip?

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_FindAP_Answer
data.value: You can find the departure and arrival spot of your trip on your ticket below "From" and "To", respectively.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_GuaranteedSeat_Answer
data.value: As soon as you purchase your ticket, your seat is guaranteed. When your driver arrives at the departure spot you selected, you only need to show your ticket and enjoy the ride.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_HowMuch_Answer
data.value: Ticket prices for our current loops are: Lisbon - Porto / Porto - Lisbon: from €36 per trip Lisbon - Coimbra / Coimbra - Lisbon: from €26 per trip Lisbon - Leiria / Leiria - Lisbon: from €16 per trip Ocasionally, some or all loops can be on sale. Corporate clients that establish partnerships with Yoyoloop can enjoy special prices. Please send an email to empresas@yoyoloop.com to know more.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_Invoices
data.value: Do you issue invoices with VAT number?

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_Invoices_Answer
data.value: Yes. As soon as you select your trip, you only need to insert your VAT number on the Billing Details section.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_PaymentMethods
data.value: What payment methods do you accept?

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_PaymentMethods_Answer
data.value: Yoyoloops accepts Multibanco and Visa, Mastercard, American Express credit cards, among others.

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_SuggestLoop
data.value: How can I suggest a new loop?

data.name: Help_Topic_TripsAndLoops_Question_SuggestLoop_Answer
data.value: To suggest a new loop, go to our homepage and click on "Can't find your city?". Leave us your email address and suggestion and, depending on the demand, we'll consider creating a loop to your city. Keep a lookout!

data.name: Help_Topic_UserDashboard_Question_WhatCanIDo
data.value: What can I do with my Yoyoloop account?

data.name: Help_Topic_UserDashboard_Question_WhatCanIDo_Answer
data.value:
On your Yoyoloop account, you can:
Edit your personal details;
Add, update or delete payment details;
Check your current account and current credit;
See future and past trips;
Invite friends to use Yoyoloop;
Check how many €1 trips you have yet to enjoy.

data.name: Help_Topic_YoyoloopCars_Question_Children_Answer
data.value: Unfortunately, we are not able to transport children under the age of 12, since our vehicles do not have child seats. Furthermore, children between the ages of 12 and 18 must travel with an adult.

data.name: Help_Topic_YoyoloopCars_Question_Electric_Answer
data.value: Not yet. Our current transfers are Mercedes V-Class five-seater vehicles. In the near future, they will be replaced by electric vehicles, in order to offer an even more sustainable alternative for intercity mobility.

data.name: Help_Topic_YoyoloopCars_Question_Insurance
data.value: Am I insured when travelling with Yoyoloop?

data.name: Help_Topic_YoyoloopCars_Question_Insurance_Answer
data.value: Yes. Yoyoloop is a travel agency registered in the National Register of Travel and Tourism Agencies (RNAVTn º 7744), so Yoyoloop passengers benefit from the protection of the Travel and Tourism Guarantee Fund. Additionally, Yoyoloop has civil liability insurance of €250.000. Read more about this subject on the Turismo de Portugal website.

data.name: Help_Topic_YoyoloopCars_Question_ProfessionalDriver_Answer
data.value: Yoyoloop only works with professional drivers. All of them have passed our selection process and are permanent members of our team.

data.name: Help_Topic_YoyoloopCars_Question_Seats
data.value: How many seats does a Yoyoloop vehicle have?

data.name: Help_Topic_YoyoloopCars_Question_Seats_Answer
data.value: Currently, our transfers are Mercedes V-Class five-seaters. In the near future, they will be replaced by electric vehicles.

data.name: Help_Topic_YoyoloopCars_Question_Wifi
data.value: Do all Yoyoloop vehicles have wifi?

data.name: Help_Topic_YoyoloopCars_Question_Wifi_Answer
data.value: Yes, every Yoyoloop vehicle has wifi on board to assure your travel time is usefully spent.

data.name: HomePage_MainTitle
data.value: Leave your car at home and travel on a premium transfer for the price of a train tricket.

data.name: HomePage_SubTitle
data.value: Book your seat on an five-seat premium transfer driven by a professional driver, and enjoy a non-stop trip where you can work comfortably, with wifi on board.

data.name: HomePage_SuggestLoop_Text
data.value:
Want Yoyoloop to give you a ride to your city?
Suggest a loop and keep a lookout for news!

data.name: HomePage_WhereToGo
data.value: Where do you want to go?

data.name: HomePage_Why_Card_Accessible_Content
data.value: For one loop, you pay 75% less than if you took your own car, and exactly the same as you would pay for going by train — and you enjoy a much more comfortable and less tiring trip.

data.name: HomePage_Why_Card_Accessible_SubTitle
data.value:
Less strain for you,
save on your wallet

data.name: HomePage_Why_Card_Convenient_Content
data.value: In addition to having frequent departures, Yoyoloop will pick you up and drop you off in strategic points in the city, such as metro stations, supermarkets, urban centres and the main office areas in Lisbon — and we top it off with free wifi on board.

data.name: HomePage_Why_Card_Reliable_Content
data.value: A professional driver will pick you up at a specific location and at a fixed departure time. Just choose your starting point, book your trip and sit back in your seat.

data.name: HomePage_Why_Card_Reliable_SubTitle
data.value:
Your very own seat,
ready on the dot

data.name: HomePage_Why_Card_Sustainable_Content
data.value: Our fleet is made up of five-seater vehicles. Not only do we take more cars off the road, we also help reduce carbon footprint.

data.name: HomePage_Why_Title
data.value: Why you should ride on a Yoyoloop transfer

data.name: HomePage_Yoyoloop_MainDescription
data.value: A different "air bridge" between Lisboa and Porto, based on five-seat premium transfers that go on the motorway.

data.name: HomePage_Yoyoloop_SubDescription
data.value: Going by train doesn't directly take you to your final destination, flights suffer constant delays, and taking your own car by yourself doesn't pay off. With a Yoyoloop premium transfer, you can comfortably go to Lisbon, Porto, Coimbra and Leiria without any stops, and assure your travel time is usefully spent working or simply relaxing. All this for the price of a train ticket.

data.name: MasterService_SendEmailConfirmation_Body_ConfirmAnswer
data.value: For data privacy reasons, Yoyoloop only considers an account as created after an email address is confirmed.

data.name: MasterService_SendEmailConfirmation_Body_ConfirmEmail
data.value: Please confirm your email address by clicking

data.name: MasterService_SendResetPassword_Body_ResetAnswer

data.name: StaticPages_About_MainDescription
data.value: Disrupting intercity mobility, one loop at a time.

data.name: StaticPages_About_Shuttles_SubTitle
data.value: Each one of our vehicles are 8-seater premium transfers: Mercedes V-Class Avantgarde with leather seats. All of them have wifi on board, and are driven by a professional driver who takes you to your destination without any stops to ensure a more comfortable journey. Our cities thank us for it.

data.name: StaticPages_About_SubDescription
data.value:
Yoyoloop has the ambition of revolutionising intercity mobility. We believe cities should amount to more than traffic jams, rush hour and parking lots.

It is precisely why we created a premium transfer service for the price of a train ticket, alternative to cars, trains and airplanes, with the difference of being more affordable, convenient, reliable and sustainable.

data.name: StaticPages_About_Why_Accessible_Content
data.value: For one loop, you get to pay 75% less than if you took your own car, and exactly the same as you would pay for going by train or other means of transport — and you get to enjoy a much more comfortable and less tiring trip.

data.name: StaticPages_About_Why_Accessible_SubTitle
data.value:
Less strain for you,
save on your wallet

data.name: StaticPages_About_Why_Convenient_Content
data.value: In addition to having frequent departures, Yoyoloop will pick you up and drop you off in strategic points in the city, such as metro stations, supermarkets, urban centres and the main office areas in Lisbon — and we top it off with free wifi on board.

data.name: StaticPages_About_Why_Reliable_Content
data.value: A professional driver will pick you up at a specific location and at a fixed departure time. Just choose your starting point, book your trip and sit back in your seat.

data.name: StaticPages_About_Why_Reliable_SubTitle
data.value:
Your very own seat,
ready on the dot

data.name: StaticPages_About_Why_Sustainable_Content
data.value: Our fleet is made up of five-seater vehicles. Not only do we take more cars off the road, we also help reduce carbon footprint.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Coimbra_LoopCard_Description
data.value: Yoyoloop gives you a ride from Lisbon to Coimbra and back. Choose the day and time you want to travel, book your trip, and wait for our professional driver to pick you up at the stop of your choice.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Coimbra_LoopCard_Schedules_TravelTime
data.value: Yoyoloop drives you from Lisbon to Coimbra in only 90 minutes

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Coimbra_MainDescription
data.value: With Yoyoloop, you can take a premium transfer frtom Lisbon to Coimbra at the same price as the train.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Coimbra_MainTitle
data.value: Leave your car at home and take a premium transfer to Coimbra

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Coimbra_Stops_Description
data.value: If you take a premium transfer from Lisbon to Coimbra, you can choose from several different departure stops, such as Amoreiras, Marquês de Pombal, Sete Rios, Campo Grande or Gare do Oriente. Arrivals to Coimbra will be in Av. Fernão de Magalhães, Portagem or Parque Industrial do Taveiro. Afer you're done with work or a one-off meeting, remember that Yoyoloop has a seat waiting for you, ready to go on the dot!

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Coimbra_Stops_StopCard_First_Description
data.value: Avenida Fernão de Magalhães is in downtown Coimbra, with easy access by car or public transport from anywhere in the city.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Coimbra_Stops_StopCard_Second_Description
data.value: Portagem is the main meeting point in Coimbra, with direct access to commerce and services in the downtown area of the city.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Coimbra_SubDescription
data.value: Although the city doesn't have a lot of traffic, the university city of Coimbra has more than 100 thousand inhabitants. The home of the Mondego River is well served by public transportation coming from the capital, although trains often suffer delays. If you come with your own car, you pay more than double for fuel, tolls and parking.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_DestinationCard_Coimbra_Description
data.value: Coimbra is an important university city with more than 100 thousand inhabitants, and it generates a constant movement of students and professionals from Lisbon and Porto.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_DestinationCard_Leiria_Description
data.value: Leiria is the central point of the western region, and it has a strong business environment. The city is well served by highways but, unfortunately, train and bus connections leave much to be desired.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_DestinationCard_Lisboa_Description
data.value:
The Greater Lisbon area has more than 2 million inhabitants.
370 thousand cars drive into the capital every day, generating constant traffic jams.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_DestinationCard_Porto_Description
data.value: The Greater Porto area has more than 1.787.000 inhabitants. 260 thousand cards drive into the country's second largest city every day, generating constant traffic jams.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Details_Stops_StopCard_HowToGet
data.value: How to get to your Yoyoloop transfer

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Leiria_LoopCard_Description
data.value: Yoyoloop gives you a ride from Lisbon to Leiria. Choose the day and time you want to travel, book your trip, and wait for our professional driver to pick you up at the stop of your choice.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Leiria_LoopCard_Schedules_TravelTime
data.value:
Yoyoloop drives you from Leiria to
Lisbon in only 1 hour and 15 minutes

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Leiria_MainDescription
data.value: Take a premium transfer to Leiria, the perfect alternative to the bus and to your car

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Leiria_MainTitle
data.value: Leave your car at home and take a premium transfer to Leiria

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Leiria_Stops_Description
data.value: If you take a premium transfer from Lisbon to Leiria, you can choose from several different departure stops, such as Amoreiras, Marquês de Pombal, Sete Rios, Campo Grande or Gare do Oriente. Arrivals to Leiria will be in Largo da República, right in the centre of the city.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Leiria_Stops_StopCard_First_Description
data.value: Largo da Reública is in the centre of Leiria. This is where you can find City Hall, the Court of Justice and other public services, and commerce. Additionally, it's very close to the Polytechnic Institute of Leiria.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Leiria_SubDescription
data.value: Leiria is one of the most important Portuguese cities, leading the western region, housing a vibrant business environment and an important academic community. Despite being close to Lisbon, public transport links to Leiria leave a lot to be desired, especially its train connection.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Lisboa_LoopCard_Description
data.value: Yoyoloop gives you a ride from Porto, Coimbra and Leiria to Lisbon. Choose the day and time you want to travel, book your trip, and wait for our professional driver to pick you up at the stop of your choice.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Lisboa_LoopCard_Schedules_TravelTime
data.value: Yoyoloop drives you from Porto to Lisbon in just 2 hours and 30 minutes.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Lisboa_MainDescription
data.value: Get a premium transfer from Porto to Lisbon. No check-in, no security delays, directly from city-center to city-center.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Lisboa_MainTitle
data.value: Leave your car at home and take a premium transfer to Lisbon

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Lisboa_Stops_Description
data.value: If you take a premium transfer to Lisbon, you can choose to stop in the capital's main office areas and still be within walking distance of a metro station. While you wait to return to your hometown, take the chance to have a cup of coffee!

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Lisboa_Stops_StopCard_Fifth_Description
data.value:
In addition to being home to the Lisbon Zoo, Sete Rios is known for being another of the most important railway and bus stations in the city. It is especially important for those who come from Sintra and South of the Tejo River, as well as for those arriving by bus from all corners of the country, especially from the southern and western regions.

Sete Rios is one of Yoyoloop's departure spots in Lisbon. From here, you can take one of our premium transfers to Porto, Leiria or Coimbra.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Lisboa_Stops_StopCard_First_Description
data.value:
The Amoreiras Towers are one of the most iconic buildings in Lisbon. Despite being a residential area and one of the capital's main office centres, the Amoreiras area is not adequately linked by the city's transport network, especially by the Lisbon Metro. It's a nuisance for Lisbon locals, but it is even more painful for those who come from the outskirts of the capital.

Amoreiras Tower 3 is one of Yoyoloop's departure spots in Lisbon. From here, you can take one of our premium transfers to Porto, Leiria or Coimbra.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Lisboa_Stops_StopCard_Fourth_Description
data.value:
Marquês de Pombal needs no introduction. It's one of the city's main office areas, although it also attracts a lot of tourists. It's an important entry point to the city, especially for those who come from Cascais, and it is served by several public transports, including two metro lines.

The Marquês de Pombal parking lot is one of Yoyoloop's departure spots in Lisbon. From here, you can take one of our premium transfers to Porto, Leiria or Coimbra.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Lisboa_Stops_StopCard_Second_Description
data.value:
Campo Grande has been an important transport area for many years. Most suburban buses from the western region arrive and depart from here. The growing presence of large companies in the area, as well as the Lusófona University of Lisbon and several faculties of the University of Lisbon, further reinforced the importance of properly linking Campo Grande.

Hotel Radisson Blu in Campo Grande is one of Yoyoloop's departure spots in Lisbon. From here, you can take one of our premium transfers to Porto, Leiria or Coimbra.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Lisboa_Stops_StopCard_Second_HowToGet_Title
data.value: Metro and buses from the western region

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Lisboa_Stops_StopCard_Third_Description
data.value:
Gare do Oriente is one of the most important railway and bus stations in Lisbon. Its privileged connection to Lisbon Airport through Avenida de Berlim also contributes to the importance of this iconic area. Every day, Gare do Oriente receives hundreds of thousands of people coming from the outskirts of the capital.

Gare do Oriente is one of Yoyoloop's departure spots in Lisbon. From here, you can take one of our premium transfers to Porto, Leiria or Coimbra.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Lisboa_SubDescription
data.value:
The Greater Lisbon area has more than 2 million inhabitants and 370 thousand cars driving into the capital every day, generating constant traffic jams.

The alternatives leave a lot to be desired. Buses and trains are slow and suffer delays, and if you come with your own car, you pay more than double for fuel, tolls and parking.

With Yoyoloop, you can take a premium transfer to Lisbon from Porto, Coimbra or Leiria for the price of a train ticket. Enjoy a faster and more comfortable journey to the city's strategic points, from Saldanha to Gare do Oriente.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_MainTitle
data.value: A different "air bridge", based on five-seat premium transfers that go on the motorway.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_LoopCard_Description
data.value: Yoyoloop gives you a ride from Lisbon and Coimbra to Porto. Choose the day and time you want to travel, book your trip, and wait for our professional driver to pick you up at the stop of your choice.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_LoopCard_Schedules_TravelTime
data.value:
Yoyoloop drives you from Porto to Lisbon
in just 2 hours and 30 minutes.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_MainDescription
data.value: Come to Porto using a premium transfer directly to the centre of the city, without security lines or need to checkin.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_MainTitle
data.value: Leave your car at home and forget about the plane or the train.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_Stops_Description
data.value:
Porto's public transportation network leaves a lot to be desired. Buses and trains are slow and suffer delays, and the Porto Metro only serves the suburbs and part of downtown. Those who come from other cities and takes their own car pay more than double for fuel, tolls and parking.

With Yoyoloop, you can take a premium transfer from Lisbon to Porto for the price of a train ticket. Enjoy a faster and more comfortable journey to Avenida da Boavista, Casa da Música, Trindade, NorteShopping or GaiaShopping.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_Stops_StopCard_Fifth_Description
data.value: Avenida da Boavista gathers several office areas in Porto. Due to its size, Yoyoloop created two stops in this avenue: one next to the Crown Plaza Hotel and close to Porto Palácio and Sheraton Porto hotels; and a second stop close to Nossa Senhora do Rosário school.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_Stops_StopCard_First_Description
data.value: Casa da Música is one of the main concert halls in Porto and one of the city's landmarks. It's located in Avenida da Boavista, one of Porto's main avenues, and is well served by five metro lines. It's one of the three Yoyoloop arrival spots for those coming from Lisbon.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_Stops_StopCard_First_HowToGet_Title
data.value: Metro: Casa da Música (line A, B, C, E, F)

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_Stops_StopCard_Fourth_Description
data.value: The Trindade station is the largest transportation interface in the centre of Porto, a stone's throw away from Avenida dos Aliados, and close to offices, shops and public institutions.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_Stops_StopCard_Second_Description
data.value: GaiaShopping is located in Vila Nova de Gaia, and it's one of the main commercial establishments in the district, with almost 150 stores, a movie theatre and a Continente superstore. It's one of three Yoyoloop arrival spots for those coming from Lisbon.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_Stops_StopCard_Third_Description
data.value: NorteShopping in Senhora da Hora has more than 260 stores. It is the largest shopping centre in the northern region. Additionally, it has a very important office centre, serving as headquarters for some of the largest national companies. It is very easy to reach, since it's very close to a metro station served by five lines. It's one of three Yoyoloop arrival spots for those coming from Lisbon.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_Stops_StopCard_Third_HowToGet_Title
data.value: Metro: Sete Bicas (line A, B, C, E, F)

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Porto_SubDescription
data.value: The Greater Porto area has more than 1.787.000 inhabitants. 260 thousand cards drive into the country's second largest city every day, generating constant traffic jams. In a recent study, it was revealed that Porto is the country's worst city to drive in, with more than 27 hours a year spent in traffic — many of them in the constantly congested VCI road.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_SubDescription
data.value:
Lisbon, Porto, Coimbra and Leiria became Looped cities.
Yoyoloop serviçe is a different "air bridge", based on five-seat premium transfers that go on the motorway.

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Why_Accessible_Description
data.value: Save your car keys, save your wallet

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Why_Reliable_Description
data.value: Your very own seat, ready on the dot

data.name: StaticPages_Destinos_Why_Title
data.value: Why you should ride on a Yoyoloop transfer

data.name: StaticPages_HowTo_MainDescription
data.value: Book your seat online and travel more enjoyably on a non-stop trip with wifi on board for the price of a train ticket

data.name: StaticPages_HowTo_MainSubDescription
data.value: Beyond online booking, it is possible to buy tickets directly from the Yoyoloop driver, from 15 minutes before departure time onwards.

data.name: StaticPages_HowTo_StepFour
data.value:
4. Remember to refer Yoyoloop to your friends to win unlimited €1 trips.
The more friends you gather, the more you earn!

data.name: StaticPages_HowTo_StepOne
data.value: 1. Choose where you want to go to and your favourite departure and arrival spots.

data.name: StaticPages_HowTo_StepThree
data.value: 3. Download your ticket and show it to your driver at the departure spot.

data.name: StaticPages_HowTo_StepTwo
data.value: 2. Safely pay for your ticket with credit card.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaCoimbra_LoopCard__TravelTime
data.value: Yoyoloop drives you from Coimbra</br>to Lisbon in just 1 hour and 30 minutes.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaCoimbra_MainDescription
data.value: Tired of driving back and forth from Lisbon to Coimbra?

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaCoimbra_MainTitle
data.value: Leave your car at home and take a premium transfer to Coimbra

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaCoimbra_SubDescription
data.value:
When it comes time to returning home at the end of a day's work or a one-off meeting, there aren't many public transport options from Lisbon to Coimbra.

Buses and trains take too long and have multiple stops, and if you come with your own car, you pay more than double for fuel, tolls and parking.

Yoyoloop gives you a stop-free ride between Lisbon and Coimbra for the price of a train ticket — or 75% less than if you take your own car — with the difference of having a much faster and more comfortable journey in a five-seater premium transfer.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaCoimbra_Why
data.value: Why you should take a premium transfer between Lisbon and Coimbra instead of other means of transport

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaCoimbra_Why_Bus_Reasons
data.value:
→ Trips take longer
→ There are several stops along the way
→ Trips are uncomfortable and noisy
→ You can only depart from Sete Rios or Oriente
→ Wifi frequently does not work and there are no sockets to charge your smartphone
→ Your luggage has to be checked and it may take some time to claim it when you arrive

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaCoimbra_Why_Car_Reasons
data.value:
→ You spend 3 to 4 times more money between tolls, fuel, insurance and car wear
→ If you travel alone, the trip is not profitable or environmentally friendly
→ You can't use your travel time to work or relax
→ Difficulty in finding a parking space
→ It takes longer if you don't take the highway
data.comment: @Ricardo - alterei isto para ir ao encontro de carro particular e não de boleias. Convém retirar a secção das "boleias tradicionais" desta secção.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaCoimbra_Why_Description
data.value: Why you should take a premium transfer between Lisbon and Coimbra instead of other means of transport

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaCoimbra_Why_Ride_Reasons
data.value:
→ Rely on daily departures
→ Enjoy a more comfortable trip for the same price of a bus or train ticket
→ Benefit from departure and arrival points in central points of your city
→ Enjoy wifi on board to assure your travel time is usefully spent
→ Respect the environment by riding on a five-seater premium transfer

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaCoimbra_Why_Train_Reasons
data.value:
→ Trips take longer
→ There are several stops along the way
→ Trips are uncomfortable and noisy
→ Delays, breakdowns and strikes happen often
→ You can only depart from Oriente or Santa Apolónia
→ You can only charge your smartphone in first class
→ The arrival spot Coimbra B is not as convenient as Av. Fernão de Magalhães

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaLeiria_LoopCard__TravelTime
data.value:
Yoyoloop drives you from Leiria to Lisbon
in just 1 hour and 15 minutes.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaLeiria_MainDescription
data.value: Tired of driving back and forth from Leiria to Lisbon?

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaLeiria_MainTitle
data.value: Leave your car at home and take a premium transfer to Leiria

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaLeiria_SubDescription
data.value: For those who live and work in the Leiria area, the only reliable alternative is a car. However, considering tolls, fuel, insurance and car wear, a single car trip can amount to around €50. On arrival, finding a parking spot in Lisbon is another challenge. Unfortunately, investments in improving rail service on the Western Line continue to be postponed.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaLeiria_Why
data.value: Why you should take a premium transfer between Lisbon and Leiria instead of other means of transport

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaLeiria_Why_Bus_Reasons
data.value: → Bus lines have several stops and take a long time.

→ If you travel alone, the trip is not profitable or environmentally friendly

→ It takes longer if you don't take the highway

→ Enjoy a direct connection between the centre of Leiria and central areas in Lisbon.

data.value:

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaPorto_LoopCard__TravelTime
data.value: Yoyoloop drives you from Lisbon to Porto in just 2 hours and 30 minutes.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaPorto_MainDescription
data.value: No check-in, no security line, directly to the city centre.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaPorto_MainTitle
data.value: Take a premium transfer from Lisbon to Porto for the price of a train ticket.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaPorto_SubDescription
data.value:
When it comes time to returning home at the end of a day's work or a one-off meeting, there are several transportation options from Lisbon to Porto, however, they're not the most viable or the most comfortable.

Buses and trains take too long and have multiple stops, and if you come with your own car, you pay more than double for fuel, tolls and parking.

Contrary to what it may seem at first, the "air bridge" between Lisbon and Porto is not the fastest or the cheapest alternative, due to the requirement of having to arrive early at the airport, the nuisance of waiting in the (sometimes endless) security line, and the inconvenience of taking a taxi or other transport to the city centre.

Yoyoloop gives you a stop-free ride between Lisbon and Porto for the price of a train ticket — or 75% less than if you take your own car — with the difference of having a much faster and more comfortable journey in a five-seater premium transfer.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaPorto_Why
data.value: Why you should take a premium transfer between Lisbon and Porto instead of other means of transport

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaPorto_Why_Bus_Reasons
data.value:
→ Trips take longer
→ There are several stops along the way
→ Trips are uncomfortable and noisy
→ Wifi frequently does not work and there are no sockets to charge your smartphone
→ You can only depart from Ste Rios or Oriente and stop in Campo 24 de Agosto
→ Your luggage has to be checked and it may take some time to claim it when you arrive

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaPorto_Why_Car_Reasons
data.value:
→ You spend 3 to 4 times more money between tolls, fuel, insurance and car wear
→ If you travel alone, the trip is not profitable or environmentally friendly
→ You can't use your travel time to work or relax
→ Difficulty in finding a parking space
→ It takes longer if you don't take the highway
data.comment: @Ricardo - alterei isto para ir ao encontro de carro particular e não de boleias. Convém retirar a secção das "boleias tradicionais" desta secção.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaPorto_Why_Description
data.value:
→ Rely on four daily trips, two in the morning and two in the afternoon
→ Enjoy a more comfortable trip for the same price of a bus and train ticket
→ Enjoy a central departure and arrival spots in your city
→ Enjoy wifi on board to assure your travel time is usefully spent
→ Respect the environment by riding on a five-seater premium transfer
data.comment: @Ricardo - Originalmente, o primeiro ponto diz "partidas de 30 em 30 minutos". Uma vez que o horário foi alterado, foi alterar esta frase

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaPorto_Why_Plane_Reasons
data.value:
→ The airplane does not provide internet access
→ It's necessary to go through the security line at the airport
→ Air traffic at Lisbon airport causes frequent delays
→ You must arrive at the airport at least 1 hour in advance
→ If you carry a carry-on bag, it may be sent to the hold of the plane
→ You need to take a taxi or other alternative transportation to the center of Porto

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaPorto_Why_Ride_Reasons
data.value:
→ You spend 3 to 4 times more money between tolls, fuel, insurance and car wear
→ If you travel alone, the trip is not profitable or environmentally friendly
→ You can't use your travel time to work or relax
→ Difficulty in finding a parking space
→ It takes longer if you don't take the highway
data.comment: @Ricardo - alterei isto para ir ao encontro de carro particular e não de boleias. Convém retirar a secção das "boleias tradicionais" desta secção.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_LisboaPorto_Why_Train_Reasons
data.value:
→ Trips take longer
→ There are several stops along the way
→ Trips are uncomfortable and noisy
→ Delays, breakdowns and strikes happen often
→ You can only charge your smartphone in first class
→ You can only depart from Oriente or Santa Apolónia and arrive in Gaia or Campanhã

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_MainTitle
data.value:
Revolutionising intercity mobility,
one loop at a time

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_SubDescription
data.value: Yoyoloop has loops between Lisbon and Porto, Coimbra and Leiria, and loops from Porto to Coimbra.

data.name: StaticPages_Privacy_Eight
data.value:
8. How long do we keep your personal data for?

According to the applicable legislation, namely in the field of tax, accounting and contractual liability, data collected through this website shall remain saved for the period of time in which the user is registered and shall be eliminated when the user requests the deletion of said data or the deletion of their registration, according to the following clause.

data.name: StaticPages_Privacy_Five
data.value:
5. Where is the User's data stored?

The Yoyoloop Team stores its clients' and Users' data on servers of a specialised partner located in the European Union. The terms and conditions of said partner can be found here: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/security/all-aws-services-gdpr-ready/
These servers are protected and maintained according to the highest security standards and in compliance with applicable privacy laws. If you wish to be removed from our database, you may exercise this right by contacting us through the various means available on our website.
Yoyoloop does not directly store user payment data. It is stored by a specialist partner, Stripe, an online payment processing company for internet businesses. The terms and conditions of said partner can be found here: LINK DO STRIPE
In order to ensure that the User's data is up-to-date and in compliance, the User can, through the Yoyoloop website:

Update their name.
Update their address.
Update their contact information: mobile phone number and email address.
Update their payment method and billing details.
Permanently delete their account.

data.name: StaticPages_Privacy_Four
data.value: 4. Who has access to the User's personal data? Yoyoloop does not disclose to third parties any personal data of its Customers and Users without their consent, except when required by law.

data.name: StaticPages_Privacy_Intro
data.value: www.yoyoloop.com is a service of the company Yoyoloop Portugal, Unipessoal, Lda, henceforth referred to as Yoyoloop, an entity headquartered in Avenida da República, nº 50, 2º Piso, 1050-196 Lisbon. This Privacy Policy advises Users of the site about our practices to protect their privacy and personal data and reiterates the authorisations granted to us regarding the collection, use and processing of personal data at the moment of registration on the website as a User:

data.name: StaticPages_Privacy_Nine
data.value:
9. Links to other sites

Within the Yoyoloop website, there may be links to third-party websites. In the event that a User follows one of these links, note that each of these websites has its own Privacy Policy and that Yoyoloop does not accept any responsibility or liability regarding these policies.

data.name: StaticPages_Privacy_One
data.value:
1. Overview of this Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy covers this website, as well as other websites that mention the same policy. The Yoyoloop team respects the User's privacy and processes their personal data according to the new General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (Regulation (EU) 2016/679).
The data collected or provided by the User will not be processed for any purpose other than those specified here.
Yoyoloop reserves the right to update or modify its Privacy Policy at any time, in particular in order to adapt it to legislative changes.

data.name: StaticPages_Privacy_Seven
data.value:
7. User Rights under the General Data Protection Regulation

The User has the right to access and rectify their data; to data portability; to be forgotten; to limit or oppose him or herself to personal data treatment; and to file a complaint and take legal action.

data.name: StaticPages_Privacy_Six
data.value:
6. Does the Yoyoloop Website use cookies?

The Yoyoloop website uses cookies. Cookies are files that store information on the user's hard drive or browser, allowing websites to recognise it and know they've visited them before. You may configure your browser to refuse cookies, but in that case the website or portions of the website may not function properly. Cookies are used to monitor and analyse the use of the website, allowing Yoyoloop to provide a better user experience.

data.name: StaticPages_Privacy_SubTitle
data.value: Yoyoloop recognises the importance of protecting your personal data, whatever its nature may be. For this reason, we have developed a set of security measures aimed at protecting your data.

data.name: StaticPages_Privacy_Three
data.value:
3. Does Yoyoloop use personal data for Marketing and Advertising purposes?

Yoyoloop will not use your personal data to send you any unsolicited mail or message for which we have not received your explicit consent. Yoyoloop does not sell or trade your data with third parties.

data.name: StaticPages_Privacy_Two
data.value:
2. For what purpose are the User's personal data stored?

The data collected in the different forms of the website are exclusively for the processing of user requests, for example:
i) Sending tickets by email;
ii) Providing technical or commercial support;
iii) Recovering or requesting a new password;
iv) Confirmation of account registration.
The data collected will not be used for any other purpose.

data.name: StaticPages_Terms_MainDescription
data.value: General conditions for Yoyoloop Users in offers available at www.yoyoloop.com.

data.name: StaticPages_Terms_One_One
data.value:
1.1 Privacy Policy
Before using the Yoyoloop website or services, we suggest that all Users read and accept our Privacy Policy.

data.name: StaticPages_Terms_One_Three
data.value:
1.3 Acceptance of the Terms of Use
By accessing this website, the User declares to have read, understood and accepted the Terms of Use described below, without the need for any further consent.

data.name: StaticPages_Terms_One_Two
data.value:
1.2 About the Terms and Conditions
Yoyoloop reserves the right to add, change or delete any of the Terms of Use of its website and services by updating the content of this page and communicating it to its Users.
The Yoyoloop Terms and Conditions cover this website, as well as other sites that mention the same policy.

data.name: StaticPages_Terms_Three_One
data.value: 3.1 Refunds Users may have access to a refund of a trip, provided that the cancellation is communicated to Yoyoloop at least 48 hours in advance of the date and time of travel. To request a refund, please send an email to reservas@yoyoloop.com. In case the request for refund is made less than 48 hours in advance, the payment of the trip will not be refunded.

data.name: StaticPages_Terms_Three_Two
data.value: 3.2 Complaints Yoyoloop has a Complaint Book. If you wish to make a complaint, please send an email to clientes@yoyoloop.com.

data.name: StaticPages_Terms_Two
data.value: 2. Using the Yoyoloop Website and Services

data.name: StaticPages_Terms_Two_Five
data.value:
2.5 General Conditions of Use
Through this site, Yoyoloop wishes to inform you about the services that it offers. The intellectual property rights over all contents of this site, except those provided by external entities duly identified, are the property of Yoyoloop, including information, tools, graphic design of Internet pages, all its components and all the figures, graphics or texts.
Yoyoloop assumes no responsibility for the damages resulting from any impossibility, delay, suspension or interruption of access to www.yoyoloop.com due to technical failures or other reasons. Yoyoloop does not guarantee that access to the site will not suffer interruptions or disturbances resulting from technical problems.
No part of the www.yoyoloop.com website may be reproduced, entirely or partially, nor may it be rented or sold without the prior permission of Yoyoloop or duly identified external entities that are providers of information.

Yoyoloop reserves the right to complete, modify or delete the information contained in the pages of the website.
Yoyoloop can not guarantee the total immunity of its site to hacker attacks and viruses or other intrusion software.
Some pages of this website use cookies and javascript. Learn more about using cookies here. Inhibition of the use of these components may constitute an obstacle to web navigation and the correct process of simulation and purchase.
Access or use of www.yoyoloop.com implies acceptance by the User of the above conditions.

data.name: StaticPages_Terms_Two_Four
data.value:
2.4 Prices and availabilities
The availabilities on the Yoyoloop website are calculated at each moment according to the demand and offer available. After a trip is confirmed, Yoyoloop reserves the right to cancel it at least two (2) hours prior to the departure time, for operational reasons. In case a trip is cancelled by Yoyoloop's own responsibility and initiative, customers with tickets purchased for the trip in question will be refunded.
Yoyoloop reserves the right to increase, reduce or maintain prices for a particular trip at any time and without prior notice, in order to ensure the correct operation of the service.

data.name: StaticPages_Terms_Two_One
data.value:
2.1 Copyright
Texts, images, graphics, downloads, sounds, videos and any other digital content depicted on the website may not be copied, distributed, modified or posted on other websites without the prior written permission of a member of the Yoyoloop team.

data.name: StaticPages_Terms_Two_Three
data.value:
2.3 Bookings on the Yoyoloop website
Bookings made on the Yoyoloop website are confirmed when the message "Your booking is confirmed" appears on the screen. The customer has the possibility to print the ticket or receive a download link of the ticket in his or her email. Bookings will only be valid for users who confirmed their email address through a link sent via email.

data.name: StaticPages_Terms_Two_Two
data.value:
2.2. User and Customer Obligations
Access to Yoyoloop's website is limited to persons over the age of 18. Nevertheless, access to certain content and/or participation in Yoyoloop sales may be subject to other age limitations, as indicated in each case. The User may not (i) authorise the use of his or her account by third parties, (ii) allow access to the site through his or her account to persons under the age of 18, (iii) allow persons under the age of 18 to make bookings, unless the minor is accompanied by the account holder. In general, the User may access the site free of charge. The User acknowledges and accepts that access and use of the site is done in a free and conscious way, under his or her sole responsibility. In no case will Yoyoloop be liable for any use that may be made of the site by the User and/or third parties, nor for the damages and losses arising from it. The User pledges to make an adequate and lawful use of the site, in compliance with the applicable legislation, with these General Conditions of Use, with public order and good customs. The User shall refrain from (i) making an unauthorised or fraudulent use of the site; (ii) access or attempt to access restricted website resources; (iii) use the site for illicit or illegal purposes or effects that are contrary to what is established in these General Conditions of Use, to good faith and to public order, in order to harm the rights and interests of third parties, or that in any way may cause damages, disable or overburden or prevent the normal use of the site; (iv) cause damage to the site or systems of its service providers or third parties; (v) introduce or disseminate computer viruses or any other physical or logical systems likely to cause damage to Yoyoloop's systems or that of its suppliers, other Users or third parties, (iv) to attempt to access, use and/or manipulate Yoyoloop, third parties, Service Providers and other Users' data; (vii) reproduce or copy, distribute, allow public access through any means of public communication, transform or modify the Content, unless authorised by the holder of the corresponding rights or if legally permitted; (viii) obtaining or attempting to obtain the Contents, using for different means or procedures different from those that, as the case may be, have been made available for the purpose. The User may only access the site through the authorised means. Yoyoloop shall not be liable if the User does not have a device compatible with the browser versions it supports.

data.name: Stripe_ErrorHandling_CardError_incorrect_cvc
data.value: The card's security code is incorrect.

data.name: Stripe_ErrorHandling_CardError_incorrect_zip
data.value: The card's zip code failed validation.

data.name: Stripe_ErrorHandling_CardError_invalid_cvc
data.value: The card's security code is invalid.

data.name: Stripe_ErrorHandling_CardError_invalid_date_format
data.value: The card's expiration date is invalid.

data.name: Stripe_ErrorHandling_CardError_invalid_expiry_month
data.value: The card's expiration month is invalid.

data.name: Stripe_ErrorHandling_CardError_invalid_expiry_year
data.value: The card's expiration year is invalid.

data.name: Stripe_ErrorHandling_CardError_invalid_number
data.value: The card number is not a valid credit card number.

data.name: Stripe_ErrorHandling_PaymentMethodValidation_Generic
data.value: There was an error when validating the payment method.

data.name: Stripe_ErrorHandling_ProcessPayment_Generic
data.value: There was an error when validating the payment.

data.name: Meta_About_Description
data.value: We believe cities should amount to more than traffic jams, rush hour and parking lots. Take one of our premium transfers and enjoy a more affordable and comfortable trip while also helping the environment.

data.name: Meta_About_Title
data.value: Disrupting Intercity Mobility, One Loop at a Time | Yoyoloop

data.name: Meta_Calendar_Description
data.value: Choose the city you want to travel to, select your departure and arrival spots, buy your ticket and enjoy the ride.

data.name: Meta_Calendar_Title
data.value: Premium Transfer to Lisbon, Porto, Coimbra and Leiria | Yoyoloop

data.name: Meta_Contact_Description
data.value: The Yoyoloop team is here to help you. Please contact us through our contact form.

data.name: Meta_Contact_Title
data.value: Get in Touch with Us | Yoyoloop

data.name: Meta_Destinos_Description
data.value: Yoyoloop is the perfect alternative to the train, the bus and the air bridge. Take a premium transfer from city centre to city centre between Lisbon, Porto, Coimbra and Leiria, and travel for the price of a train ticket.

data.name: Meta_Destinos_Title
data.value: Premium Transfers from City Centre to City Centre | Yoyoloop

data.name: Meta_Help_Description
data.value: Get help with booking a trip, promo codes, your Yoyoloop account, or browse through frequently asked questions.

data.name: Meta_Homepage_Description
data.value: Yoyoloop is a premium transfer service alternative to other transports. Get a ride to Lisbon, Porto, Coimbra, Leiria and back for the price of a train ticket.

data.name: Meta_Homepage_Title
data.value: Travel on a Premium Transfer for the Price of a Train Ticket | Yoyoloop

data.name: Meta_HowTo_Description
data.value: Travelling on Yoyoloop's premium transfers is very easy. Choose your departure and arrival spots, safely pay for your trip, download your ticket and show it to our professional driver.

data.name: Meta_HowTo_Title
data.value: How to Travel on a Premium Transfer | Yoyoloop

data.name: Meta_Loops_Description
data.value: With Yoyoloop, you can travel to Lisbon from Porto, Coimbra and Leiria and back in a premium transfer. You can also travel between Porto and Coimbra.

data.name: Meta_Loops_Title
data.value: Premium Transfers to Lisbon, Porto, Coimbra and Leiria | Yoyoloop

data.name: Meta_Privacy_Description
data.value: Understand how and why Yoyoloop uses your personal information to book a seat on one of our loops.

data.name: Meta_Terms_Description
data.value: Read Yoyoloop's terms and conditions, a premium transfer service alternative to other transports.
